wikipedia_page.main: John Holsgrove (born 27 September 1945) is an English former professional footballer who played as a central defender. Active in the Football League between 1964 and 1976, Holsgrove made over 300 career appearances.

response: His father John Holsgrove and brother Lee Holsgrove were also professional footballers.
*John Holsgrove (born 1945), English footballer, father of Lee and Paul
